Geo_Utils¶

Geo utils for address verification and converting addresses to lat, lon

locator.geo_utils.address_is_valid(address)¶

Validate address in the form of address, city.

Address:Address to validate, e.g. 9500 Gilman Dr., La Jolla
Returns:True if valid, else False
locator.geo_utils.get_lat_lon(address)¶

Get lat lon from address using pygeocoder

Address:Address to convert to lat lon
Returns:Tuple of lat lon
